SELECT
T002.intoCompanyYearAndMonth as reflectYearAndMonth,
T002.retirementYearAndMonth as reflectYearAndMonth,
T002.employeeNo, CONCAT(T001.employeeFristName,T001.employeeLastName)as employeeName, M005.employeeFormName, T005.salary, T005.socialInsuranceFlag, CAST(T005.insuranceFeeAmount As unsigned) As insuranceFeeAmount, CAST(T005.fristTimeBonusAmount + T005.secondTimeBonusAmount As unsigned) As scheduleOfBonusAmount, T005.remark FROM T002EmployeeDetail As T002 LEFT JOIN T001Employee As T001 on T002.employeeNo=T001.employeeNo LEFT JOIN T005WagesInfo As T005 on T002.employeeNo = T005.employeeNo and
T002.intoCompanyYearAndMonth = T005.reflectYearAndMonth
T002.retirementYearAndMonth = T005.reflectYearAndMonth
LEFT JOIN M005EmployeeForm As M005 on T002.employeeFormCode = M005.employeeFormCode WHERE 1=1
AND intoCompanyYearAndMonth between #{startYandM} and #{endYandM}
AND retirementYearAndMonth between #{startYandM} and #{endYandM}

SELECT T005.employeeNo, CONCAT(T001.employeeFristName, T001.employeeLastName)as employeeName, M005.employeeFormName, T002.employeeFormCode, T005.salary, T005.fristTimeBonusAmount as lastTimeBonusAmount, T005.socialInsuranceFlag, T005.fristBonusMonth As reflectYearAndMonth, CAST(T005.insuranceFeeAmount As unsigned) As insuranceFeeAmount, CAST(T005.fristTimeBonusAmount + T005.secondTimeBonusAmount As unsigned) As scheduleOfBonusAmount, T005.remark FROM T001Employee As T001 LEFT JOIN T005WagesInfo as T005 on T001.employeeNo =T005.employeeNo LEFT JOIN T002EmployeeDetail As T002 on T005.employeeNo = T002.employeeNo LEFT JOIN M005EmployeeForm as M005 on M005.employeeFormCode=T002.employeeFormCode WHERE fristBonusMonth between #{startYandM} and #{endYandM}

SELECT T005.employeeNo, T005.reflectYearAndMonth, T005.employeeStatus as employeeFormCode, if(T005.employeeStatus = "",T005.employeeStatus,M005.employeeFormName) as employeeFormName, T005.salary, T005.waitingCost, T005.socialInsuranceFlag, T005.fristBonusMonth as nextBonusMonth, T005.fristTimeBonusAmount as lastTimeBonusAmount, T005.fristTimeBonusAmount + T005.secondTimeBonusAmount as scheduleOfBonusAmount, T005.remark FROM T005WagesInfo AS T005 Left Join M005EmployeeForm as M005 on T005.employeeStatus = M005.employeeFormCode

SELECT T002.employeeNo, left(T002.intoCompanyYearAndMonth,6) as intoCompanyYearAndMonth, left(T002.retirementYearAndMonth,6) as retirementYearAndMonth,
M005.employeeFormName as employeeFormName, CONCAT(T001.employeeFristName, T001.employeeLastName) as employeeName FROM T002EmployeeDetail As T002 LEFT JOIN T001Employee As T001 on T002.employeeNo = T001.employeeNo Left Join M005EmployeeForm as M005 on T002.employeeStatus = M005.employeeFormCode WHERE T001.employeeFristName is not null
AND intoCompanyYearAndMonth between concat(#{startYandM}, "01") and concat(#{endYandM}, "31")
AND retirementYearAndMonth between concat(#{startYandM}, "01") and concat(#{endYandM}, "31")
and left(T002.employeeNo,2) != "BP"

SELECT T005.employeeNo, T005.fristBonusMonth as nextBonusMonth, T005.employeeStatus as employeeFormCode, if(T005.employeeStatus = "",T005.employeeStatus,M005.employeeFormName) as employeeFormName, CONCAT(T001.employeeFristName, T001.employeeLastName) as employeeName FROM T005WagesInfo As T005 LEFT JOIN T001Employee As T001 on T005.employeeNo = T001.employeeNo Left Join M005EmployeeForm as M005 on T005.employeeStatus = M005.employeeFormCode WHERE fristBonusMonth between #{startYandM} and #{endYandM} and T001.employeeFristName is not null group by employeeNo,fristBonusMonth

SELECT T005.employeeNo, T005.reflectYearAndMonth, T005.employeeStatus as employeeFormCode, if(T005.employeeStatus = "",T005.employeeStatus,M005.employeeFormName) as employeeFormName, CONCAT(T001.employeeFristName, T001.employeeLastName) as employeeName FROM T005WagesInfo As T005 LEFT JOIN T001Employee As T001 on T005.employeeNo = T001.employeeNo Left Join M005EmployeeForm as M005 on T005.employeeStatus = M005.employeeFormCode WHERE reflectYearAndMonth between #{startYandM} and #{endYandM} and T001.employeeFristName is not null
